New Records: LeBron James passed Michael Jordan for the most 30-point games in NBA history with 563 games.
LeBron James moved into fourth in the most number of games played in the NBA on 1,523 games.
Key Match Events: The Los Angeles Lakers took a 14-13 lead with seven minutes and 31 seconds left in the first quarter which they never lost.
The Lakers won their seventh game out of their last nine.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed pride in being mentioned with the greats and said it's'super-cool' to be in the conversation with Michael Jordan.
LeBron James said he idolized Michael Jordan in his childhood and wears the number 23 because of him.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Davis returned from a one-game absence with an ankle problem to claim 18 points and 19 rebounds for LA.
Austin Reaves had 20 points for the Lakers.
Trae Young had 33 points and nine assists for the Hawks.
Jalen Johnson added 19 points for the Hawks.
Others: The Oklahoma City Thunder stretched their winning run to a team record-equalling 14 games with a 117-107 victory over the New York Knicks.
Victor Wembanyama finished with 35 points, 18 rebounds and four assists and had a crucial steal in the final seconds as the San Antonio Spurs edged past the Denver Nuggets 113-110.
